perturbation.original_text: 6.3. DISCLAIMER. EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT, NEITHER PARTY MAKES ANY REPRESENTATION OR EXTENDS ANY WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE OR NON-INFRINGEMENT.
perturbation.changed_text: 14.15 Disclaimer: EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT, NEITHER PARTY MAKES ANY REPRESENTATION OR EXTENDS ANY WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE OR NON-INFRINGEMENT.
perturbation.explanation: Moving the warranty disclaimer to a later section, and renaming it 'Disclaimer', makes it less prominent and harder to find. The original section 'Warranties' is designed to be very visible and easy to find by anyone reading the document. This is further degraded by renaming it to simply 'Disclaimer', further reducing its effectiveness.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Uniform Commercial Code (UCC) Article 2, which governs warranties in sales contracts.

perturbation.contradicted_law: General principles of contract law regarding clarity and consistency in legal agreements.
